short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to start blocking users on Instagram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that blocks every user a given account is following on Instagram.

Helpful information:

- You must be on the Instagram website and logged in to use the extension.
- Do not close the Instagram tab whilst the block party is in-progress.
- To avoid potential issues, use a different browser window for other activities, leaving the Instagram tab and block party extension open until completion.
